step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm stretched overhead. Keep that arm straight and feel the gentle resistance.
Excellent! You're maintaining the overhead stretch. Focus on keeping your arm fully extended throughout the movement.
Great job opening your palm and fingers wide. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. Visualize the fluid moving!
Good start for the second repetition. Ensure your arm remains straight overhead, feeling that stretch.
You're keeping your arm extended well. Continue to focus on maintaining that overhead position.
Nicely done opening your hand wide. Remember to relax and exhale fully.
Excellent fist and muscle tightening with your inhale. Keep visualizing that lymph flow!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the stretch. Focus on opening your hand wide while exhaling and making a fist while inhaling to effectively promote lymph flow.
